group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
This is the crystallization of hope that was@entrusted directly to Himena and the others.

group_1.textCenter: The sin I carried by refusing to become a Vestal@Maiden of Light…
I have atoned for my guilt.
Perhaps that was the foundation for the age@of Pax Romana…?
The future that Lady Himena and her friends@spoke of gave me hope.
And now I'll give them my hope for the future@in turn.
To the future where Lady Himena returned…
That will be my final act as someone who@stands for peace.
To all those who fought by my side to help me@fulfill my wish…
This is the only way I can repay you.
